title: Simple, fluid & familiar-looking font, but what's it's name again ?
content:
I stumbled upon this font, and I would like to try it out myself. It seems very familiar to me, but I can't remember it's name. I searched my entire font-libary for it, but I think expert advice is needed and welcome ... PS: I like the fluid lines of it, and "johan roose" is a holistic therapist in europe (belgium)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [JohanRoose.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202145143/http:/typophile.com/files/JohanRoose.jpg) | 24.79 KB |
author: Johan.67

comments.content: Many thanks Tamas for your fast reply. This font seemed familiar to me, but I didn't know it at all, Dragonwick is a cute name for it. I wish you good health and fortune.
